entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
